titleStmt.title: Signatura rerum, or, The signature of all things shewing the sign and signification of the severall forms and shapes in the creation, and what the beginning, ruin, and cure of every thing is ... / written in High Dutch, MDCXXII, by Jacob Behmen, aliàs Teutonicus Phylosophus.
De signatura rerum. English
titleStmt.author: Böhme, Jakob, 1575-1624.
Ellistone, John, d. 1652.
